name: Operation Lockdown
description:
# Operation Lockdown #

A Puzzle-Themed Game In Which The Player Will Spawn In The Basement Of A House; The Player Will Have The Goal Of Escaping The Household In Which They Are Trapped In. There Is A Timer Of 2minutes 30seconds For Each Room. Each Room Will Have Their Own Unique Puzzle Which Will Allow The Player To Make Progression Through The Game.

# Controls #

The Controls For This Game Consist Of

WASD For Movement

P To Pause The Game

LEFT SHIFT To Sprint

C To Crouch

SPACE To Jump

F To Rotate Puzzle Related Objects

E To Open Doors

L To Change Lights 

# Creation #

This game was created within Unreal Engine using the version 4.25.6
